result.reason: Right shift key not forwarded correctly under Chrome Remote Desktop is likely a CRD keyboard capture limitation, but need to confirm whether issue occurs on all protocols (RDP/VNC/SSH) or just specific ones, and whether a scancode remapping workaround is feasible in mRemoteNG.
result.approach: Investigate keyboard scancode translation in RDP protocol layer; Chrome Remote Desktop may not forward VK_RSHIFT (0xA1) distinctly from VK_LSHIFT (0xA0) — check if extended key flag handling in the RDP ActiveX keydown path can compensate
